sentences.cn: 一种常用的工业化学品

sentences.en: A little adolescent rebellion is commonly believed to be healthy.
sentences.cn: 大家一致认为，青少年有点叛逆是正常的。

sentences.en: Christopher is commonly known as Kit.
sentences.cn: 克里斯托弗通常被称为基特。

sentences.en: Grey-market perfumes and toiletries are now commonly sold by mail.
sentences.cn: 水货香水和化妆品现在常常通过邮购方式售卖。

sentences.en: Income in New England is commonly 10 % below the national average.
sentences.cn: 在新英格兰人们的收入通常比全国平均数低10%.

sentences.en: It is not a theory that is commonly subscribed to.
sentences.cn: 一般人并不赞成这个理论.

sentences.en: Leagues are commonly made for mutual defence.
sentences.cn: 结成联盟往往是为了共同防御.

sentences.en: Many words once commonly used have fallen into desuetude.
sentences.cn: 许多过去曾通用的词,今天已经废弃不用了.

sentences.en: More commonly, funding controls are imposed in the annual appropriations process.
sentences.cn: 更普遍的作法是, 拨款控制被规定在年度拨款手续中.

sentences.en: Other amenities, less commonly available, include a library and exercise room.
sentences.cn: 还有一些不太常有的设施，包括图书馆和健身房。

sentences.en: Parsley is probably the most commonly used of all herbs.
sentences.cn: 欧芹可能是用得最多的一种药草。

sentences.en: Sodium chloride is more commonly known as salt.
The disease is more commonly known as Mad Cow Disease.
sentences.cn: 这种疾病更通俗的名称是疯牛病。

sentences.en: The most commonly cited reasons for stopping the treatment were lack of efficacy and side effects.
sentences.cn: 最常举出的停止这种治疗的理由是无效和副作用.

sentences.en: The rash most commonly appears on the back.
The United States of America is commonly abbreviated to U.S.A..
sentences.cn: 美利坚合众国常被缩略为U. S. A..

sentences.en: This behaviour is commonly observed among several species of finch.
sentences.cn: 这种行为常常可以在几种雀科鸣禽中看到.

words.tran_cn: 共同的；普通的；一般的；通常的
老生常谈；司空见惯的事；普通的东西

trans.tran_cn: 通常地，一般地，平凡地，粗俗地
